lead_paragraph: GLICKENHAUS--Seth. The Board of Directors and staff of Planned Parenthood Hudson Peconic (PPHP) mourn the passing of beloved PPHP Champion and extraordinary philanthropist Seth Glickenhaus. Our condolences to his wife Sarah, his children and their families. Ann Pogue, Board Chair Reina Schiffrin, President/CEO 1/3
